趖字的基本解释

趖
suō
走；移动：“豆蔻花间趖晚日。”

趖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suō］
［《廣韻》蘇禾切，平戈，心。］
(1)谓走。引申指太阳西斜、落山。
(2)指星斗西移。

趖字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【走字部】　趖； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1217第29
【廣韻】蘇和切【集韻】蘇禾切，?音莎。【說文】走意。【廣韻】走疾。

趖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
趖字的起名意思

走得极快。

趖
Basic explanation of words
趖
suō
Go; Move: "The cardamom flower is in the evening."
趖
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suō］
["Guangyun" Su Heqie, Ping Ge, Heart. ]
(1) Said to go. The extension refers to the sun slanting westward and setting.
(2) Refers to the westward movement of the star.
趖
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Zhou Zi Department] 　趖; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1217 29
[Guang Yun] Su Heqie [Ji Yun] Su Heqie,? Yinsha. [Said the text] leave the meaning. [Guang Yun] Going ill.

趖
Name meaning
Go very fast.
suō
走得很快 run; walk fastly。 如: 趖西(太阳偏西)
